name: mikroe.click.silentstep4
short_description: Silent Step 4 Click is a compact add-on board representing a completely integrated step motor driver solution. This board features the TMC2240, a smart integrated stepper driver from Analog Devices. The driver is based on a 256 micro-steps built-in indexer, two fully integrated H-Bridges, and non-dissipative integrated current sensing (ICS). The two H-Bridges can drive motors of up to 36V and 3A at max.
